item.title: META
item.description: score:-72 Chances: Meta Platforms is testing new AI chatbot technology in India, signaling a potential for growth in AI offerings The company is implementing features on Instagram to protect young users from nudity and scams, showing a proactive approach to user safety Risks: Australian prosecutors have discontinued the criminal prosecution of Meta over scam cryptocurrency advertisements, which could potentially impact the company’s reputation The age limit for social media usage has been lowered to 13 in the UK and EU, potentially leading to increased regulatory scrutiny and privacy concerns Score:-72 chances characters count - risks characters count = -72
